summary: Implements a pipeline component that extracts detailed statistics from segmentation outputs for each case and aggregates them into a comprehensive report. It supports configurable image and label keys, optional connected‑component processing, channel‑wise histogram computation with custom bins and ranges, and a mode that generates only histogram data. Internally it leverages per‑case analyzers and summary aggregators to produce the final metrics.
business_intent: Enable automated evaluation and reporting of 3D medical image segmentation models by providing standardized statistical summaries and visualizable histograms, aiding developers and clinicians in assessing model performance.
